CIBokehBlur.softness: The softness of the bokeh effect.

CIDepthBlurEffect._NOTE: THIS WAS GLEANED FROM WWDC2017#508 VIDEO; NO OFFICIAL APPLE DOCUMENTATION FOUND
CIDepthBlurEffect.aperture: Simulated lens aperature to adjust blur for unfocused elements
CIDepthBlurEffect.chinPositions: Vector of up to 4 x,y positions indicating where peoples' chins are
CIDepthBlurEffect.disparityImage: Grayscale image indicating depth; lighter is nearer.
CIDepthBlurEffect.focusRectangle: Part of the rectangle to make sure to put into focus
CIDepthBlurEffect.leftEyePositions: Vector of up to 4 x,y positions indicating where peoples' left eyes are
CIDepthBlurEffect.nosePositions: Vector of up to 4 x,y positions indicating where peoples' noses are
CIDepthBlurEffect.rightEyePositions: Vector of up to 4 x,y positions indicating where peoples' right eyes are
CIDepthBlurEffect.scaleFactor: Integrated downsampling (rather than doing it later) since this is computationally expensive

CIDepthOfField.point0: The first point in the focused region of the output image.
CIDepthOfField.point1: The second point in the focused region of the output image.
CIDepthOfField.unsharpMaskIntensity: The intensity of the unsharp mask effect applied to the in-focus area.
CIDepthOfField.unsharpMaskRadius: The radius of the unsharp mask effect applied to the in-focus area.

CIDroste._NOTE: THIS WAS GLEANED FROM MICROSOFT.COM DOCUMENTATION; NO OFFICIAL APPLE DOCUMENTATION FOUND
CIDroste.insetPoint0: A vector that represents the first corner of the rectangular inset region.
CIDroste.insetPoint1: A vector that represents the second corner of the rectangular inset region.
CIDroste.periodicity: The number of times that the image is repeated in each spiral of a stranded Droste image.
CIDroste.rotation: The amount by which to rotate the inset image.
CIDroste.zoom: A value that controls by how much to zoom the inset image

CIEdgePreserveUpsampleFilter.lumaSigma: A value that specifies the influence of the input imageâs luma information on the upsampling operation.
CIEdgePreserveUpsampleFilter.smallImage: The image that the filter upsamples.
CIEdgePreserveUpsampleFilter.spatialSigma: A value that specifies the influence of the input imageâs spatial information on the upsampling operation.

CIGuidedFilter._NOTE: THIS WAS GLEANED FROM DESCRIPTIONS OF THIS FILTER IN GENERAL; NO OFFICIAL APPLE DOCUMENTATION FOUND
CIGuidedFilter.epsilon: Smoothness. A higher value means more smoothing.

CIHueSaturationValueGradient.dither: A Boolean value specifying whether the dither the generated output.
CIHueSaturationValueGradient.softness: The softness of the generated color wheel.

CILenticularHaloGenerator.haloOverlap: The separation of colors in the halo.

CIPerspectiveCorrection.crop: A rectangle that specifies the extent of the corrected image.

CIToneCurve.point0: A vector containing the position of the first point of the tone curve.
CIToneCurve.point1: A vector containing the position of the second point of the tone curve.
CIToneCurve.point2: A vector containing the position of the third point of the tone curve.
CIToneCurve.point3: A vector containing the position of the fourth point of the tone curve.
CIToneCurve.point4: A vector containing the position of the fifth point of the tone curve.
